channel.title: Wat codes for memb area?
channel.description: :) :)I really want to know how to do a memb are, can u say me?? and u got a good page for items id(silab)

item.title: Wat codes for memb area?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“Sunkist, post:3, topic:220542”]Hm…over the past couple weeks i’v gotten pretty good at understanding newb speak.
I do believe he’s asking how to make a members only area. although i could be mistaken.

Anyways if im right, heres how you do it…

Just after where your command says

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“member”)

add this

&& playerIsMember == 1)

and it will look like this:

[quote]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“member”) && playerIsMember == 1)
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops…blah blah blah.”); //made by Sunkist
}
else
{
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;
send,Message(“You teleport to the members area.”);
}
}[/quote][/quote]sendMessage("…");

Read full topic

item.title: Wat codes for memb area?
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

Hm…over the past couple weeks i’v gotten pretty good at understanding newb speak.
I do believe he’s asking how to make a members only area. although i could be mistaken.

Anyways if im right, heres how you do it…

Just after where your command says

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("member")

add this

&& playerIsMember == 1)

and it will look like this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("member") && playerIsMember == 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops...blah blah blah."); //made by Sunkist } else { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; send,Message("You teleport to the members area."); } }

Read full topic
